long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Grimmli, your all-in-one solution to supercharge your Chrome new tab page. This dynamic extension revolutionizes your browsing experience by combining sleek design with powerful features that are just a click away.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing "Grimmli" extension and setting new tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. search results will be powered by Yahoo.

Key Features:

Effortless Navigation with Quick Links:

Grimmli introduces easy-access buttons at the bottom of your new tab page, providing instant links to your bookmarks, history, downloads, most visited pages, and recently closed pages. Say goodbye to the hassle of digging through menusâ€”Grimmli puts your most-used features within reach, making your browsing seamless and efficient.

English to English Dictionary:

Elevate your linguistic skills with Grimmli's built-in English to English dictionary functionality. Whether you're a word enthusiast or looking to enhance your language proficiency, Grimmli's dictionary feature lets you explore definitions and synonyms directly from your new tab page, enriching your vocabulary effortlessly.

Stay on Schedule with Real-Time Local Clock:

Grimmli keeps you punctual and aware of your local time with a stylish and accurate real-time clock displayed prominently on your new tab page. Manage your time effectively, stay organized, and never miss a beat while enjoying a visually appealing and functional clock interface.

Revitalize your Chrome new tab experience with Grimmli and unlock a world of productivity and convenience. Download Grimmli now to enjoy a seamlessly integrated browsing environment that adapts to your needs, providing quick access to essential tools and features. Transform your new tab page with Grimmli - where style meets functionality!
